title: Boxmoji v1 | Hand drawn emoji icons
description: Unleash a world of whimsy with Boxmoji v1! Each hand-drawn emoji is a labor of love, infused with personality and charm. I poured my heart (and plenty of caffeine) into crafting these quirky masterpieces. Watch as they breathe life into your projects, turning ordinary conversations into delightful experiences. It's not just an icon pack – it's a box full of digital smiles!

title: More projects - coming soon...
description: The creative cauldron is bubbling with excitement! I'm cooking up a storm of new ideas, each one more thrilling than the last. While I can't spill all the beans just yet, I can promise you this: the projects coming down the pipeline are set to push boundaries, ignite imaginations, and maybe even change the game. Stay tuned – the best is yet to come!

title: Polaroid Prints - Figma Template for Retro Photo Magic!
description: Step into a time machine with our Polaroid print templates in Figma! I've lovingly crafted each template to capture that perfect blend of vintage charm and modern design. It's more than just a template – it's a portal to cherished memories and retro cool. With just a few clicks, watch your digital snaps transform into nostalgic treasures. Get ready to sprinkle some retro magic dust on your designs and let the good times roll!
